source:
#### The purpose of this pyspark notebook is to ingest data from Json formatted file listed_building_outline.json  into delta tables, odw_standardised_db.listed_building and odw_standardised_db.listed_building_outline.

**Description**  
The functionality of this notebook is to ingest data from Json formatted file listed_building_outline.json  into delta tables, odw_standardised_db.listed_building and odw_standardised_db.listed_building_outline.The addtitional functionality has been added to log the audit information to Application Insight by creating a Json dump at notebook exit.

**Spark Cluster Configuration** -> Apache Spark Version- 3.4, Python Version 		- 3.10, Delta Lake Version 	- 2.4
from pyspark.sql.types import StructType, StructField, StringType, IntegerType, TimestampType

json_schema = StructType([
    StructField("dataset", StringType(), True),
    StructField("end-date", StringType(), True),
    StructField("entity", StringType(), True),
    StructField("entry-date", StringType(), True),
    StructField("geometry", StringType(), True),
    StructField("name", StringType(), True),
    StructField("organisation-entity", StringType(), True),
    StructField("point", StringType(), True),
    StructField("prefix", StringType(), True),
    StructField("reference", StringType(), True),
    StructField("start-date", StringType(), True),
    StructField("typology", StringType(), True),
    StructField("documentation-url", StringType(), True),
    StructField("listed-building-grade", StringType(), True)
])

storage_acc_name = spark.sparkContext.environment.get('dataLakeAccountName', 'get')
df = spark.read.option("multiline","true").json(f"abfss://odw-raw@{storage_acc_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/ListedBuildings/{date_folder}/listed_building.json")
entities_df = df.selectExpr("explode(entities) as entity")
entities = [row.entity.asDict() for row in entities_df.collect()]
final_df = spark.createDataFrame(data=entities, schema=json_schema)

json_schema = StructType([
    StructField("address", StringType(), True),
    StructField("address-text", StringType(), True),
    StructField("dataset", StringType(), True),
    StructField("document-url", StringType(), True),
    StructField("documentation-url", StringType(), True),
    StructField("end-date", StringType(), True),
    StructField("entity", StringType(), True),
    StructField("entry-date", StringType(), True),
    StructField("geometry", StringType(), True),
    StructField("listed-building", StringType(), True),
    StructField("name", StringType(), True),
    StructField("notes", StringType(), True),
    StructField("organisation-entity", StringType(), True),
    StructField("point", StringType(), True),
    StructField("prefix", StringType(), True),
    StructField("reference", StringType(), True),
    StructField("start-date", StringType(), True),
    StructField("typology", StringType(), True)
])

storage_acc_name = spark.sparkContext.environment.get('dataLakeAccountName', 'get')
df = spark.read.option("multiline","true").json(f"abfss://odw-raw@{storage_acc_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/ListedBuildings/{date_folder}/listed_building_outline.json")
entities_df = df.selectExpr("explode(entities) as entity")
entities = [row.entity.asDict() for row in entities_df.collect()]
final_df = spark.createDataFrame(data=entities, schema=json_schema)
